title: Calories in Sharp Cheddar Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in sharp cheddar cheese per ounce, including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and variations for better meal planning.
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28g) serving of block sharp cheddar cheese, aged 9-12 months, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, aging process, fat content, and portion size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One ounce of sharp cheddar cheese contains about 110 calories and 7 grams of protein.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

tweaks.label: Use extra sharp cheddar (longer aged, higher fat)
Melt with 1 tsp butter per oz

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz of sharp cheddar cheese?
What is the protein content in sharp cheddar cheese?
faqs.a: About 7 grams of protein per 1 oz.

faqs.q: Does sharp cheddar cheese have carbs?
faqs.a: Very low at 1 gram of carbs per 1 oz, with no fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in sharp cheddar cheese?
faqs.a: Around 180 mg of sodium per 1 oz, which can vary by brand.

faqs.q: Is sharp cheddar higher in calories than mild cheddar?
faqs.a: Similar calorie count, but sharp may have slightly more fat due to aging process.
